'zowens' is not a valid login or you do not have permission.

In case you havent figured it out, this is my first ASP.NET(sql) configuration.

Why would this be in a schema script?

If you use ultimahosts please post how you published. I would greatly appreciate admin access to my web site.

Hmmm... these are generated using SQL SMO... this shouldn't be an issue.

Have you used SQL Publishing wizard before? That will generate scripts for you.

Ultima gives you access to EVERYTHING. You can access the dbs through SQL Management and they also allow full trust applications.
